Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
05.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
16.05.2012 GB SCR17341 Changed condition for calculation the Calculate bookings
04.04.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
12.07.2011 SH SCR16606 Fixed bug with calc of bookings (initialization)
02.05.2011 SH SCR16423 Replaced GB002 by GB902
01.02.2011 GB SCR16182 Extended list of parameters in the call BAD013
10.01.2007 SH SCR12171 Fixed bug with duplicate v.Balance fields
22.12.2006 SH SCR12171 Changed test to enable button OK to be now
V.PROVISION - V.BOOKOFF > -500
20.12.2006 SH SCR12171 Diff. changes acc. to individual / commercial clients
05.12.2006 SH SCR12149 Changed tasktitle
-- Global values
-- Shortcut labels
-- Shortcut handling
-- Park cursor on "Book off" if client was entered (after the screen refresh)
-- Init variables on screen (at R.P. level because subtask use values from ADMN)
-- Database updates
-- Calculate bookings
-- Check for changes, made by user
-- If user changed something on screen, ask to save changes
-- If client changed on screen then the screen has to be refreshed
for the new client if key "Enter" was pressed, same behaviour then as
key "Tab" to force ControlChange of client. In this case UserAction 20
has not to be performed!
-- Check if something was changed on screen
... if selected/entered client does not exists --> ERROR
-- Perform a screen refresh, to populate the screen with values for client
@Handler has not to be performed if key "Enter" was pressed on fields
admin/client (=client change)
-- Validations
-- Only for initialization
... calculate balances
-- Updates
... Calculate bookings

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (CMON_CURRBALINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON where CMON_ADMNO = :2 and CMON_CLNTNO = :3 and CMON_YEAR = :4 and CMON_MONTH = :5 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':6' for fetch only

select cast (sum (LGCC_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LGCC, :1/ADML, :1/CLNT where CLNT103_COMM_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO = :3 and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and LGCC_LDGR_NO = ADML_LEDGERNO and ADML_ADMN_NO = :4 and ADML_LTYP_TYPE in (131,132,134) for fetch only

select cast (sum (LGCC_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LGCC, :1/LDGR where LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :2 and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :3 and LDGR_ADMNO = LGCC_LGCD_ADMNO and LDGR_NO = LGCC_LDGR_NO and LDGR_ADMNO = :4 and LDGR_NO = :5 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Finally call BPH107 to perform the real ledger bookings
